entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
